text: Bhupinder Nath Kirpal (B. N. Kirpal) (born 8 November 1937) is an Indian judge. He was the 31st Chief Justice of India from 6 May 2002 until his retirement on 7 November 2002.Brief biography at http://supremecourtofindia.nic.in/ ==References== Category:Chief justices of India Category:1937 births Category:Living people
title: Bhupinder Nath Kirpal
